thread.title: Judge demands pint of blood to stay out of jail
thread.title_full: Judge demands pint of blood to stay out of jail

title: Judge demands pint of blood to stay out of jail
text:
Published By: CBS News: Video - Today 
An Alabama circuit court judge is facing an ethics complaint after demanding defendants donate a pint of blood or face jail time...
